mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (member_id, travel_id, coordinates, video_url, thumbnail_url, title, description) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{travelId}, ST_GeomFromText(#{coordinates}, 4326), #{videoUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{title}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_url, thumbnail_url, title, description FROM video WHERE video_id = #{video_id}
SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_url, thumbnail_url, title, description FROM video WHERE travel_id = #{travel_id}
SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_url, thumbnail_url, title, description FROM video WHERE member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT video_id, member_id, travel_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, video_url, thumbnail_url, title, description FROM video WHERE ST_DWithin(coordinates, ST_GeomFromText(#{coordinates}, 4326), #{distance});
